message:
# Check for the group's existence using getent
getent group devgroup

# Search for the group in /etc/group using grep
grep devgroup /etc/group

# Add a comment to summarize the results
echo "# If no output is shown above, it confirms that 'devgroup' no longer exists on the system."
# If no output is shown above, it confirms that 'devgroup' no longer exists on the system.
